comments: by far worst speech teacher! she has a website she created..if you do all the work there you will pass other then that dont even take her.she will ask for your numbers and CALL YOU to see if you are going to attend class.started with a full class with people trying to add ended up with 2 rows of people rather stay another sem then to take her class

hated this class!the notes were absolute nonsense and did not help for exams.was confused about due dates all the time.this teacher is wack!she\'ll ask the class to raise their hands if they understand a topic, completely unnecessary.class so horrible i chose to fail rather than going to class again.

There is only 4 speeches, & a couple of other assignments. She has a website that has examples so it\'s not hard to do the assignments. The book is also helpful. However, at time she can be confusing, so simply ask her to explain again or talk to her alone.She does offer extra credit as well. She is a great teacher who cares for her students.

As soon as she made everybody get up from their seats so we could sit alphabetically, I was out of there. We\'re in college, not in elementary school. Her itinerary for the class was extremely confusing. The first day of class, we had at least 8 things to do for the next class. I want to be comfortable in speech class, not angry. I dropped the class

Terrible! this teacher is so confusing I thought I was in a different class when I came out of there. Keeps sutdents late all the time and assignments are boring and cheesy. Do not take her courses.. she is not worth the draaagg..

Hated her class... She is so confusing... Changes the syllabus every week.. Talks too much about herself.. She has a very annoying personality.. Really hated her class... Just follow her stupid website and you\'ll do fine. That is if she doesn\'t change it.. MATTER OF FACT, Skip her class all together if you can.. We started with 25 and ended with 9

She\'s ok. 7 out of 10. She tells you what she wants in her class but she can be confusing sometimes because she talks fast and would jump from one topic to another. I think she\'s not intimidating at all. She tries hard to make her class fun but sometimes she would turn out corny. I like her though, she made me feel comfortable doing my speeches.
